data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.
from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: The day on which a person is born, or the anniversary of the day; hence, day or time of origin or commencement.
Relating or pertaining to the day of a person's birth, or to its anniversary: as, a birthday ode or gift; birthday festivities.
Of or pertaining to the day of birth, or its anniversary.
data.attributionText: from the GNU version of the Collaborative International Dictionary of English.

data.text: The day in which any person is born; day of origin or commencement.
data.attributionText: from the GNU version of the Collaborative International Dictionary of English.

data.text: The day of the month in which a person was born, in whatever succeeding year it may recur; the anniversary of one's birth.
data.attributionText: from the GNU version of the Collaborative International Dictionary of English.

data.text: The anniversary of the day on which something is created.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: The date on which someone is born or something is created, more commonly called <xref>birthdate</xref> or <xref>date of birth</xref>.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: the date on which a person was born
